name: Pickled Herring Smørrebrød (Danish Open-Faced Sandwich)
description: This classic Danish open-faced sandwiche features pickled herring with rich butter and dense, tangy sourdough rye bread.
recipeIngredient: 1 slice rugbrød (dense Danish sourdough rye bread), about 1/3-inch thick
Thinly sliced red onion, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: If not already trimmed, cut rye bread to a 3- by 5-inch rectangle.
Spread butter evenly all over top side of bread.
Arrange pickled herring on butter, covering the surface evenly. Tuck red onion between the pieces of herring and garnish with chopped dill. Serve right away.
